mapper.select: SELECT L.LICENCE_ID AS licenceId,L.USER_ID AS userId,L.LICENCE_CODE AS licenceCode,L.NAME AS name, L.BEGIN_TIME AS beginTime, L.END_TIME AS endTime,L.NOTIFIED_BODY AS notifiedBody,L.LICENCE_TYPE AS licenceType FROM HR_LICENCE L WHERE L.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND L.USER_ID=(SELECT U.USER_ID FROM HR_USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=#{accountId})
